propose.from sentence: In this work , we propose an interactive multitask learning network ( IMN ) , which solves both tasks simultaneously , enabling the interactions between both tasks to be better exploited .

AE and AS.from sentence: Furthermore , IMN allows AE and AS to be trained together with related document - level tasks , exploiting the knowledge from larger document - level corpora .

fined - grained tokenlevel classificatio.from sentence: In addition , IMN allows fined - grained tokenlevel classification tasks to be trained together with document - level classification tasks .

explicitly models.from sentence: In contrast to most multi-task learning schemes which share information through learning a common feature representation , IMN not only allows shared features , but also explicitly models the interactions between tasks through the message passing mechanism , allowing different tasks to better influence each other .

information.from sentence: The information is then combined with the shared latent representation and made available to all tasks for further processing .

novel message passing mechanism.from sentence: IMN introduces a novel message passing mechanism that allows informative interactions between tasks .

sends.from sentence: Specifically , it sends useful information from different tasks back to a shared latent representation .

two document - level classification task.from sentence: We incorporated two document - level classification tasks - sentiment classification ( DS ) and domain classification ( DD ) - to be jointly trained with AE and AS , allowing the aspect - level tasks to benefit from document - level information .
